title: Rebekah Vardy callously calls Coleen Rooney a 'pigeon' who 'annihilated' her
text:

Rebekah Vardy has dug her claws into Coleen Rooney amid their public spat.

The mum, 37, unleashed a poisonous response to her so-called friend's scathing accusation that fake stories had been leaked by someone who had access to Rebekah's Instagram .

In a scathing first interview since the WAG war broke out, the pregnant star compared her new-frenemy to a "pigeon".

The WAG replayed how her confrontation went on the phone to Coleen.

She said: "That would be like arguing with a pigeon. You can tell it that you are right and it is wrong, but it's still going to s*** in your hair."

(Image: PA)

The I'm A Celeb star lamented her friend had "completely annihilated" her in the public when she accused her Instagram account of being behind the leaked stories.

She went on: "I thought she was my friend but she completely annihilated me. She [Coleen] said: 'You know, I always really liked you, which makes it harder'."

Emotional Rebekah told how she was bombarded with death threats following the leaked stories scandal.

(Image: SplashNews.com)

Police attended the mansion where she lives with her husband Jamie and their children after the death threats.

The reality star admitted she broke down in tears when she was targeted by cruel online trolls.

She said: "I have been told that I should die, that my children should die, my unborn child should die.

"It would be unacceptable for anyone. I am tough, but this has made me cry. It is hard to explain how horrible it has been."

(Image: copyright unknown)

Rebekah claimed she has given her Instagram password out to a PR agency and an advertising agency over the years.

Coleen waged war on fellow WAG Rebekah when she exposed Rebekah's Instagram account of leaking stories about her.

The mother-of-five told her followers how she had planted a series of false stories on her private Instagram page that was only accessible to view by Rebekah Vardy's account.

(Image: Getty Images)

Social media went into meltdown over the drama and Coleen has been dubbed "WAGatha Christie" for her detective work.

Rebekah hit back at Coleen to deny the claims and express her sadness that her friend hadn't picked up the phone to ask her about it.

Ex WAG Danielle Lloyd even weighed into the explosive row as she appeared on This Morning to discuss the WAG war.

Danielle, who raises children with her footballer ex Jamie O'Hara, said she "wasn't shocked" to see Coleen out Rebekah as the mole.

Rebekah then tweeted: "Danielle Lloyd making false claims on @thismorning that we have had ‘similar run-ins’ is utter b*******.

"She is just fuming that I 'didn’t get Jamie recruiting' for her like she asked me to..."
description: Rebekah laid into her so-called friend Coleen in her first vicious interview after the scandal broke
